name: Informational sign No. 1, transgenerational legacy
description:
Road Signs is a collection of drawings made on the occasion of the demonstrations that are taking place in Colombia since April 2021. It seeks to make visible the struggle of millions of young people who are trying to transform a fragmented country.

It uses the colors of the Colombian flag to make direct reference to this conflict; but it represents situations and political events common to all underdeveloped countries.

It uses the symbolism of traffic signs because, like these, its objective is to inform citizens of the eventualities that they may encounter in the development of the democratic ways and regulate the circulation of the political actors involved.
